body: When posting the media category, make sure you are sharing content that directly related to the Avicus Network. Livestreaming matches, PVP montages, screenshots from in game, etc. You may share your media channels given they have content from Avicus Network.
body_tagged: When posting the media category, make sure you are sharing content that directly related to the Avicus Network. Livestreaming matches, PVP montages, screenshots from in game, etc. You may share your media channels given they have content from Avicus Network.
title: Strictly Avicus Related Content
